derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French disparité, from late Latin disparitas, based on Latin paritas 'parity'

entry.def: If there is a disparity between two or more things, there is a noticeable difference between them.

example.ex: ...the economic disparities between East and West Berlin.
example.tran: 东西柏林之间经济上的悬殊

example.ex: ...the great disparity of wealth between rich and poor countries.
example.tran: 贫富国家间的财富鸿沟

means.word_mean: 1. inequality or difference in some respect

auth_sentence.content: The economic disparity between the two Koreas is huge.
auth_sentence.res_content: The economic disparity between the two Koreas is huge.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The economic disparity between the two Koreas is huge.

auth_sentence.content: Disparity in years...is not invariably a bar to harmony.

auth_sentence.content: It is hard to overstate the disparity of resources.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =bring birth,表示"生产,生出小孩"; 2. =come in sight,表示"看见;出现"; 3. =get ready,表示"准备;安置"; 4. =equal,表示"平等"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 一胎多子的, 经产的, 非初产的, [植]多产的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 初产的, 初次分娩的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 表面上的,貌似真实的;显然的,明明白白的

in不+separable[adj.可分离的, 可分的]→adj.不能分的
se分离+par置+able……的→adj.可分离的, 可分的
se分离+par置+ate表形容词→adj.分开的, 分离的

compare比较+ative表形容词→adj.比较的, 相当的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 奇数的,不成对的,不平等

comparative[adj.比较的, 相当的]+ly表副词→adv.比较地, 相当地

stems_affixes.word_buile: ap=ad+par准备;安置+atus表名词→准备好用的东西→设备
par准备;安置+ade表名词→本为部队训练场[即准备打仗得地方],引申为排队游行
prepare准备+ation行为,过程→n.准备, 预备
re再+pair=par准备;安置→重新准备好→修理
com一起+pari=par平等+son→一起平等→比较
dis不+parity同等→n.不同,差异
par平等→n.一对, 一双
par平等+ity表名词→n.同等;奇偶

pre预先+par准备;安置+e→预先准备好
re再+pair=par准备;安置→重新准备好→修理
com共同+par平等+e→平等的放在一起→比较
dis不+par平等+age动词后缀→不平等对待→轻视

Sentence.sentence: This disparity (差异) suggests the memory of our previous meal may have a bigger influence on our appetite than the actual size of the meal.

means.word_mean: （尤指因不公正对待引起的）不同，不等，差异，悬殊
